price: Luego, a pesar de eso, los perdoné para que fueran agradecidos.
arabic: ثُمَّ عَفَوۡنَا عَنكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma ʿafawnā ʿankum min baʿdi dhālika laʿallakum tashkurūna
